description: Ensure plan.json includes instructions for agents to update task status as they complete work. Currently agents execute but don't mark tasks complete in the .json file.

notes.problem: Agents execute tasks but plan.json task statuses remain unchanged
notes.current_behavior: Agent completes work, plan.json still shows pending
notes.desired_behavior: Agent marks task complete in plan.json after execution
potential_solutions: Add explicit instruction in plan.json template
Add post-task hook to update status
Include status update in task definition
